attributes.action: Seize and liquidate Mugabe assets in Europe and repatriate proceeds to Zimbabwe
attributes.additional_details: There is a castle in Scotland for starters...
attributes.background: Mugabe plundered Zimbabwe public's tax and used out for personal gain to invest in property in Europe and UK. We, the people of Zimbabwe want those funds returned to us to rebuild our nation by selling off all the Mugabe assets since he no longer has diplomatic immunity

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to do this.
